description: Auto-generated knowledge base from Trino database schema

master_region_id.description: Foreign key referencing t_master_region.master_region_id; indicates the region in which the platform operates.

examples: Neem Bhringraj Summer Hair Oil - 100 ml
Neem Bhringraj Winter Hair Oil - 100 ml
Bitter Milk Tikta Cream Face Wash

master_region_id.description: Foreign key referencing t_master_region.master_region_id; indicates the region in which the platform operates.

master_platform_id.description: Primary key; unique identifier for each platform.

master_region_id.description: Primary key; unique ID for each region.

region_name.description: Name of the region (e.g., ap_south1, me_central1).

brandFilter.description: How to filter by brand name
brandFilter.pattern: JOIN database.global.t_master_brand b ON CAST(a.master_brand_id AS uuid) = b.master_brand_id WHERE LOWER(b.brand_name) = 'brandname'

platformFilter.pattern: JOIN database.global.t_master_platform p ON CAST(a.master_platform_id AS uuid) = p.master_platform_id WHERE LOWER(p.platform_name) = 'amazon'

monthComparison.pattern: WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM date) = 1 AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date) IN (2025, 2026) GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date)

identifiers: Usually company names without codes or numbers

products.description: Product SKUs/names - stored in product_name column
identifiers: Often contain codes, numbers, or technical identifiers

typeCasting.description: master_brand_id and master_platform_id are VARCHAR in lakehouse but UUID in database tables
typeCasting.solution: Always use CAST(column AS uuid) when joining cross-catalog
